about_the_game:
Take part in a space journey focused on exploration, diplomacy, trading, piracy, and interactions with powerful factions. Stranded in a distant galaxy, your goal is survival—whether through scavenging, trading, combat, or piracy. Your choices define your path.

Key Features

  • Vast Galaxy: Start in a remote corner of the galaxy filled with unexplored star systems, each with unique resources and secrets. Factions compete for control, and traders and pirates look to profit. Expect to encounter hidden stations, abandoned ships, and valuable minerals.
  • Evolving Exploration: The galaxy is dynamic. As factions unlock new resources, advanced technologies and equipment become available, influencing the market and your options.
  • Faction Influence: Multiple factions are in conflict for dominance. Engage with them in battle, trade, or diplomacy to influence their power and who will control the galaxy.
  • Living Ecosystem: Pirates, traders, diplomats, and free agents interact independently. The galaxy evolves based on their actions and yours, leading to changing conditions and alliances.
  • Space Stations: Access various types of assistance from space stations. Whether you need financial support, medical enhancements, or military rank, stations offer ways to gain an edge.
  • Skill Development: Learn new skills to achieve your objectives. Each skill comes with its own strengths and weaknesses, allowing you to create a unique strategy by balancing pros and cons.

Player Agency

As captain, you’ll focus on finding opportunities—exploring star systems, gathering resources, and engaging in combat to build your reputation and secure your place in the galaxy.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 4800+ 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8600 GT 512 Mb / Radeon X3550 Pro 512 Mb
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: You find yourself in a distant galaxy full of merchants, diplomats, bandits and powerful factions. Explore unknown galaxies, trade, fight pirates or become one. Uncover mysteries and shape the universe!
